summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 23 and 24, 2nd Supplemental Crown Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue West and 11th Avenue West, from West Garfield Street to West Galer Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 87840, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
